title: Worthplaying | 'Tropico 6' Tropican Shores DLC Will Add New Buildings, Sandbox Maps, Edicts And More Later This Month - Screens
text: In times of political turmoil and social unrest, the people are calling out for a visionary leader, one who will steer the fate of their country with foresight and ingenuity Face new challenges on the international stage and always keep the needs of your people in mind, in spite of any negative press covfefe. Tropico 6 represents a bold new lease of life for the much-loved series, with the developer (Limbic Entertainment at the time) bringing exciting new ideas to El Presidente’s highly-polished table, as well as a stunning new engine developed in Unreal Engine 4. For the first time in the series, manage extensive archipelagos, build bridges to connect your islands and establish new means of transportation and infrastructure. Send your agents on raids to steal the wonders of the world, including the Statue of Liberty and the Eiffel Tower. Customize your palace at will and give election speeches from your balcony, to win the favor of your subjects. Publisher Kalypso Media and in-house developer Gaming Minds Studios in collaboration with the ever-gracious El Presidente, have announced Tropican Shores, the latest DLC addition to the critically acclaimed strategy game Tropico 6. Tropican Shores brings a host of new features to the game including new buildings, sandbox maps, edicts, and more making waves on June 18 on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows PC, and PlayStation 4|5. In Tropican Shores, players will navigate the ebbs and flows of their paradise as El Prez graciously authorizes the expansion of the glorious nation of Tropico to the bountiful seas. Fifteen new buildings change the tides of Tropico with new opportunities for infrastructure, entertainment, public services and more along with the shiny new resource plucked from the abundant depths of the ocean – Pearls. Offshore buildings do come at a cost, but as always, El Prez has you covered with three new edicts that will effectively reduce construction costs and increase their efficiency, while also offering new options to tax your citizens. Tropican Shores also brings four new sandbox maps to the game including the map from the Yachts for El Presidente scenario along with options to enhance your sea style including a new Scuba Outfit, with activities galore like Submarine Tours and even Dolphin Therapy to relax from all of your tiresome yet rewarding role in keeping the nation of Tropico afloat.Ride the tide of prosperity as you dive into the new scenario Yachts for El Presidente, that will serve as a guide to assist in navigating the new features and additions in Tropican Shores. Key Features: - Experience Tropico 6 – Next Gen Edition on console in native 4k resolution and find your streets bustling with life. - Play on large archipelagos for the first time in the series. Manage multiple islands at the same time and adapt to various new challenges. - Send your agents on raids to foreign lands to steal world wonders and monuments, so you can add them to your collection. - Build bridges, construct tunnels, and transport your citizens and tourists in taxis, buses, and aerial cable cars. Tropico 6 – Next Gen Edition offers completely new transportation and infrastructure possibilities. - Customize the looks of your palace at will and choose from various extras. - Tropico 6 – Next Gen Edition features a revised research system focusing on the political aspects of being the world’s greatest dictator. - Election speeches are back! Address the people and make promises that you can’t possibly keep. - Tropico 6 – Next Gen Edition features multiplayer for up to 4 players. - Includes a digital Soundtrack, "The Llama of Wall Street" DLC, and the El Prez Pack DLC containing new game mechanics, more buildings, and much more additional content! Tropico 6 is available for Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and PC. [More articles about Tropico 6](/game/10843-tropico-6/)
